skills.name: Programming Languages
skills.description: I have experience and exposure to different programming languages that help to build software for the modern web.

skills.name: Frameworks & Services
skills.description: Obtaining speed and efficency through battle-tested web development frameworks to build amazing software.

skills.name: Web Development
skills.description: Understanding of web development concepts including HTTP protocols, RESTful APIs, and client-server architecture.

skills.name: Databases
skills.description: Knowledge of database management systems and understanding of database modeling, querying, and optimization techniques.

skills.name: Server-Side Development
skills.description: Ability to build and maintain server-side applications, including implementing business logic, handling data storage, and integrating with external services. Familiarity with frameworks like Express.js or Django is beneficial.

skills.name: Version Control
skills.description: Proficiency in using version control systems like Git for source code management, including branching, merging, and resolving conflicts.

skills.name: Front-End Development
skills.description: Familiarity with modern front-end tools and frameworks, including HTML, CSS preprocessors (e.g., Sass, Less), responsive design principles, and JavaScript libraries like jQuery.

skills.name: User Experience (UX) and User Interface (UI) Design
skills.description: Basic understanding of UX/UI principles to create user-friendly interfaces and ensure a smooth user experience.

skills.name: Testing and Debugging
skills.description: Knowledge of unit testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Pytest) and debugging techniques to identify and fix issues in both front-end and back-end code.

skills.name: Deployment and DevOps
skills.description: Experience with deploying applications to hosting platforms (e.g., AWS, Laravel Forge, Netlify, Render) and understanding of basic DevOps concepts, including continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.description: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and resolve technical issues efficiently. The ability to break down complex problems into smaller, manageable parts is essential.

skills.name: Collaboration and Communication
skills.description: Effective communication skills to collaborate with team members, understand requirements, and provide updates on progress. Familiarity with agile development methodologies (e.g., Scrum) is beneficial.

skills.name: Continuous Learning
skills.description: Eagerness to learn and stay updated with emerging technologies, frameworks, and best practices in the field of full stack development.
